issue.title: [Rust/Parquet] Add benchmarks for Parquet
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4063](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4063). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should add some benchmarks for Parquet, maybe referring to [here](https://github.com/sunchao/parquet-rs/tree/master/benches). These benchmarks should not be added to the CI jobs. Instead they should only be triggered manually.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4063?focusedCommentId=17332016) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/31
